# local-Zepto
>

## Installation


```bash
npm install local-Zepto
```

Dependencies

```bash
Input the dependencies of widgets
```

## How to use

 * code
 * change your name and email by edite package.json
 * npm run server
 * npm run demo
 * npm run add
 * npm run commit
 * npm run push
 * npm run pull
 * npm run newbranch
 * npm run branch
 * npm publish
 * http://localhost:3000

## How to publish
 * npm set registry http://npm-dev.huangbaoche.com
 * npm login : login m-dev.huangbaoche.com
 * npm publish
